success.description: Indicates if the request was successful

data.description: Array of data returned from the endpoint

success.description: Indicates if the request was successful

error.description: Error message describing what went wrong

discordId.description: The Discord user ID of the node operator.

walletAddress.description: The Ethereum wallet address associated with the node operator.

createdAt.description: Timestamp (milliseconds since epoch) when the operator was created.

updatedAt.description: Timestamp (milliseconds since epoch) when the operator was last updated.

discordId.description: The Discord user ID of the node operator.

walletAddress.description: The Ethereum wallet address associated with the node operator.

updatedAt.description: Timestamp when operator was last updated

verified.description: Whether the overall verification (score + role assignment) was successful.

roleAssigned.description: Whether the Discord role was successfully assigned/updated.

address.description: The wallet address recovered from the signature.

status.description: Final status of the verification process (e.g., verification_complete, verification_failed).

message.description: A user-friendly message summarizing the result.

minimumRequiredScore.description: The minimum score required for verification.

verificationId.description: The verification ID associated with this status check.

walletConnected.description: Whether a wallet address is associated with this verification.

verified.description: Whether the verification process was successfully completed (met score threshold).

roleAssigned.description: Whether the Discord role was assigned.

score.description: The user's score, if verification was attempted.

status.description: The current status of the verification process (e.g., pending_signature, verification_complete).

minimumRequiredScore.description: The minimum score required for verification.

lastChecked.description: The timestamp when this status check was performed.

success.description: True if the score is sufficient, false otherwise.

status.description: Status indicating score sufficiency (e.g., score_sufficient, verification_failed).
Current status of verification (e.g., pending_signature, verification_complete)

lastVerificationTime.description: Timestamp (ms) when verification was last completed

verificationId.description: ID used for the verification process

interactionToken.description: Discord interaction token for UI updates

updatedAt.description: Timestamp when user was last updated

get.description: Retrieves the list of committee members for the current epoch

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing API key

500.description: Server error occurred while retrieving committee data

get.description: Retrieves the list of all attesters (validators) in the rollup system

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing API key

500.description: Server error occurred while retrieving validators data

get.description: Retrieves complete information about the rollup's current state including block numbers, validators, committee members, and other chain data

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing API key

500.description: Server error occurred while retrieving rollup status

get.description: Retrieves a list of all registered node operators.

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing API key

post.description: Registers a new node operator with their Discord ID and wallet address.

400.description: Bad Request - Missing or invalid body parameters

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing API key

409.description: Conflict - Operator with this Discord ID already exists

get.description: Retrieves a specific node operator using their Discord ID.

parameters.name: discordId
parameters.description: The Discord ID of the operator to retrieve.

delete.summary: Delete an operator by Discord ID

parameters.description: The Discord ID of the operator to delete.

put.description: Updates the wallet address for a specific node operator using their Discord ID.

parameters.name: discordId
parameters.description: The Discord ID of the operator to update.

200.description: Operator updated successfully. Returns the updated operator.

400.description: Bad Request - Missing discordId parameter or invalid/missing walletAddress in body

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing API key

get.description: Retrieves a specific node operator using their wallet address.

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: The wallet address of the operator to retrieve.

400.description: Bad Request - Missing or invalid address parameter

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing API key

parameters.name: verificationId
parameters.description: The verification ID (can also be provided in body)

verificationId.description: The verification ID (if not provided in query)

400.description: Bad request - missing parameters or invalid signature

get.summary: Get passport score for a given address and verification

parameters.name: verificationId
parameters.description: The verification ID obtained during verification initiation.

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: The wallet address to check (case-insensitive comparison).

500.description: Server error during score fetching or processing
